Header.title: Introduction to Data Science
Header.paragraph: Enhance your skills in Data Science to grow yourself, be knowledgeable and efficient enough to get recognised in any industry.

About.paragraph: 1.Learn from industry professionals having more than 15 years of industry experience.
About.paragraph1: 2.Learn in a hybrid model-live-interactive and experiential learning .
About.paragraph2: 3. Gain hands-on experience from day 1 by working on some amazing capstone projects.
About.paragraph3: 4. Small batches to focus on personalized learning.
About.paragraph4: 5.Get a certificate after completion of the course.
